page.title: 15Miss E.Conacher - Resident
page.content: Miss E.Conacher aged 84 is one of the oldest residents in Colton.Her grand _father was a farmer in the village. This lady and her brothers grew up here, where she has lived most of her life.Now she is the only member of the family in the village, although a nephew farms in the neighbourhood. Miss Conacher has family connections with Bilbrough, where her nieces and nephew were educated.One of them has emigrated to Canada.She remembers the milk being brought to Colton from Bilbrough.In 1985 Colton supplies Bilbrough.When she was younger, she taught in the Sunday School. Miss Conacher lives in a pleasant modern bungalow, which she designed herself.She still drives a car, as there is no public transport.
